description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. BUILD, MINE, FIGHT, EXPLORE and PROCREATE in your own world of Dinora. Brave it alone or share the experience with up to 3 friends in drop-in/drop-out split screen multiplayer. Hours and hours of fun in one unforgettable sandbox adventure. If you liked Terraria you’ll love Dinora, with its unique spin on NPC interaction.
description.short: BUILD, MINE, FIGHT, EXPLORE and PROCREATE in your own world of Dinora. Brave it alone or share the experience with up to 3 friends in drop-in/drop-out split screen multiplayer. Hours and hours of fun in one unforgettable sandbox adventure. If you liked Terraria you’ll love Dinora, with its unique spin on NPC interaction.
